directions.step:
Wash and core wind-fall apples or crabapples. Grind through cider press. Strain juice and boil for five minutes and seal. >From Favorite recipes of Colfax Country Club Women, 1946 by Mrs. Zenas Curtis, Cimarron Typed by Ethel Snyder <essie49@juno.com> Date August 12, 1997
Recipe by: Southwestern Cookery cookbook Posted to Bakery-Shoppe Digest V1 #194 by essie49@juno.com (Ethel R Snyder) on Aug 17, 1997
